info.description:
Centrobill API

 The HTTP headers are used to pass additional information between the clients and the server through the request and response header.
Certain request customization requires setting HTTP headers.
`Content-Type` and `Accept` headers control input and output format.

# Authentication

<!-- ReDoc-Inject: <security-definitions> -->

get.summary: Get the list of IP addresses that requests may come from
Get test payment data by ID
Get list of the test payment data

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the test payment data

put.summary: Update balance of the test payment data

post.summary: Emulate 3Ds for the test payment data
Not emulate 3Ds for the test payment data

get.summary: Get available channels of code verification
Get list of currency exchange rates

emulate-code.title: Emulate transaction's decline code. For example, 5003 will throw "Invalid merchant" decline. See full declines list below in responses under payment object.

3ds.title: Payment should be processed with 3D Secure. True by default

payment-account-id-with-cvv.title: Concrete payment account of customer with CVV number

3ds.title: Payment should be processed with 3D Secure. True by default

domain-name.title: Domain name (without protocol)
domain-name.description: In case if property is passed site domain name will be replaced

oneOf.title: Boolean flag of repeat
oneOf.description: false - not repeat, true - repeat ever

browser-accept-header.title: Browser accept header
browser-accept-header.description: Exact content of the HTTP accept headers as sent to the 3DS Requestor from the Cardholder's browser.

browser-java-enabled.title: Browser java enabled
browser-java-enabled.description: Boolean that represents the ability of the cardholder browser to execute Java. Value is returned from the navigator.javaEnabled property.

browser-language.title: Browser language
browser-language.description: Value representing the browser language as defined in IETF BCP47. The value is limited to 1-8 characters. Value is returned from navigator.language property.

browser-color-depth.title: Browser color depth
browser-color-depth.description: Value representing the bit depth of the colour palette for displaying images, in bits per pixel. Obtained from Cardholder browser using the screen.colorDepth property.

browser-screen-height.title: Browser screen height
browser-screen-height.description: Total height of the Cardholder's screen in pixels. Value is returned from the screen.height property.

browser-screen-width.title: Browser screen width
browser-screen-width.description: Total width of the Cardholder's screen in pixels. Value is returned from the screen.width property

browser-timezone.title: Browser timezone
browser-timezone.description: Time difference between UTC time and the Cardholder browser local time, in minutes. The field is limited to 1-5 characters where the value is returned from the getTimezoneOffset() method.

ipn.title: URL
ipn.description: Callback Notification will be sent to this URL after purchase

redirect.title: URL
redirect.description: User will be redirect to this URL after purchase

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Used for storing additional structured information associated with payment

oneOf.title: SKU object with SKU name and custom prices

id.description: Required in case if consumer.externalId or consumer.email are empty

externalId.description: Required in case if consumer.id is empty

email.description: Required in case if consumer.id is empty

firstName.description: Required in case if paymentSource.type is not one of consumer, paymentAccountIdWithCvv, token

lastName.description: Required in case if paymentSource.type is not one of consumer, paymentAccountIdWithCvv, token

consumer.userAgent: mozilla/5.0 (iphone; cpu iphone os 13_1_2 like mac os x) applewebkit/605.1.15 (khtml, like gecko) version/13.0.1 mobile/15e148 safari/604.1

code.title: Payment code
code.description:
| code | description
|---|---|
| 0 | success |
| 5000 | General bank decline |
| 5001 | Refer to Issuer |
| 5003 | Invalid merchant |
| 5004 | Pick up card(no fraud) |
| 5005 | Do not honor |
| 5006 | Payment could not be authorised |
| 5007 | Pick up card, special condition (fraud account) |
| 5010 | Partial approval |
| 5012 | Invalid transaction |
| 5013 | Invalid Amount |
| 5014 | Invalid Card Number |
| 5015 | No such issuer |
| 5016 | Invalid Cardholder Name |
| 5019 | Re enter |
| 5030 | Format error |
| 5041 | Lost card, Pick up (fraud account) |
| 5043 | Stolen card, pick up (fraud account) |
| 5046 | Closed account |
| 5051 | Insufficient Funds |
| 5054 | Expired Card |
| 5055 | Invalid PIN |
| 5057 | Transaction not permitted - Card |
| 5058 | Transaction not permitted - Terminal |
| 5059 | Suspected fraud |
| 5061 | Exceeds withdrawal amount limit(s) / Withdrawal amount limit exceeded |
| 5062 | Invalid service code, restricted |
| 5063 | Security Violation |
| 5065 | Activity Limit Exceeded |
| 5070 | PIN data required |
| 5075 | Allowable number of PIN tries exceeded |
| 5078 | Invalid/nonexistent account specified (general) |
| 5080 | Credit issuer unavailable |
| 5082 | Negative online CAM, dCVV, iCVV, CVV, or CAVV results or Offline PIN authentication interrupted |
| 5085 | No reason to decline |
| 5086 | Cannot verify PIN |
| 5091 | Issuer or switch is unavailable |
| 5093 | Violation, cannot complete |
| 5094 | Duplicate transaction |
| 5096 | System error |
| 5099 | Expired payment |
| 5220 | Authentication Failed by Card Issuer |
| 5221 | Authentication is Unavailable at the current time |
| 5222 | Verification failed or cancelled |
| 5223 | Rejected authentication by the issuer  |
| 5224 | Card not enrolled |
| 5225 | Attempts processing performed |

cycle.title: A sequential number of recurring payments in a subscription
cycle.description:
| value | description |
|---|---|
| 0 | subscription has an initial payment |
| n | subscription has n recurrent payments |

action.description:
|  action name | description |
|---|---|
| charge | Card will be charged immediately.  |
| redirect | Consumer should be redirected to url for second step |
action.title: The default action that should be undertaken

payment-page.title: Payload to generate link of payment page

oneOf.title: SKU object with SKU name and custom prices

id.description: Required in case if consumer.externalId or consumer.email are empty

externalId.description: Required in case if consumer.id is empty

email.description: Required in case if consumer.id is empty

firstName.description: Required in case if paymentSource.type is not one of consumer, paymentAccountIdWithCvv, token

lastName.description: Required in case if paymentSource.type is not one of consumer, paymentAccountIdWithCvv, token

ip.description: Required in case if payment.selected or payment.method are not empty

language.title: Payment page language
language.description: Language of payment page. If empty, omitted or unsupported - Centrobill will determine it automatically based on the browser settings and the geographical location of the client

layout.title: Layout of payment page
layout.description: Layout (theme) for payment page. If empty, omitted or unsupported - Centrobill will use default theme

templateParameters.title: Custom paramets of payment page
templateParameters.description: Key  value list of layout parameters

secure.title: Secure payment
secure.description: If true, Centrobill will attempt additional payment verification (such as 3DSecure). Centrobill will determine it automatically. True by default.

test.title: Indicates if the payment must will be processed in test mode

mid.title: Process the payment via specified merchant account.

ttl.title: Lifetime in seconds of payment page. By default 600

sku.name: TEST_EN_00
sku.title: 30 day recurring + First 30 Days For Free

payment-page-2.title: Object to represent payment page URL

credit-code.title: Credit code
credit-code.description:
| code | description |
|---|---|
| 0 | success |
| 1 | bank decline |
| 2 | anti-fraud system decline |
| 3 | decline due limits |
| 5 | payment expired

cycle.title: A sequential number of recurring payments in a subscription
cycle.description:
| value | description |
|---|---|
| 0 | subscription has an initial payment |
| n | subscription has n recurrent payments |

cancelDate.title: Date of cancel
cancelDate.description: In case if cancelDate is not passed or null, subscription will canceled immediately

description-2.title: Product (SKU) description
description-2.description: Description will be displayed on payment page

type.title: Type of product (SKU)
type.description:
| type | description |
|---|---|
| one-time | single payment |
| subscription | recurrent payments |

price.title: Price
price.description: Use "Amount of product" definition for "one-time" type, "Price object" for "subscription" type

group-id.title: Consumer group ID
group-id.description:
| id | description
|---|---|
| 1 | whitelist |
| 2 | blacklist |
| 3 | junior |
| 4 | senior |
| 5 | expert |

test-payment-data.title: Object to represent test payment data

type.title: Type of the test payment data

emulate3ds.title: True if test payment data needs to emulate 3Ds process

balance.title: Balance of the test payment data

createdAt.title: Date when test payment details were created

updatedAt.title: Date when test payment details were updated

test-payment-data-array.title: Object to represent test payment data array

balance.description: Desired balance of the test payment data

type.description: Type of the test payment data

emulate3ds.description: True if needs to emulate also 3Ds for this test payment data

balance.description: Balance of the test payment details

emulate3ds.description: Should be True if emulate 3Ds and False when not emulate

verification-channels.title: Object to represent code verification channels
verification-channels.description: List of available channels of verification
